description: Enemies always have {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLEED}. After an enemy takes damage from this debuff, all other enemies take the same amount of damage. Enemies' {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLEED} damage is based on its highest stat instead of {STAT_health}. Enemies take damage from {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLEED} 1 additional time.
name: Cornered
